Methods and Main Functions
======================================

In this section, we present the methods included in the package and their corresponding functions.
For in-depth methodological details, please refer to the cited literature;
our focus here is on function design, outputs, and visualization.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   FunFEM
   FunLBM
   FunCC
   FunPF
   FunSparse
   FunSAS
   FunLocal
   Bimax
   SSVD
   CVX
